name: Ulf Langheinrich
biography: Ulf Langheinrich began studying art at the Dresden Academy of Fin Arts in 1978, the same year that he was called upon to do his military service in the National People's Army of the GDR. IN 1981, he embarked on a period of study in industrial design in Halle, albeit this was short having been put in a request to be expelled as a citizen of East Germany. He took courses with the painter Eberhard von der Erde and carried out audio experiments. In 1985 he studied painting at the Kassel Gesamthochschule. From 85-91 he taught art & photography at Gottingen public school.  1n 1988 he moved to Vienna and undertook a wide range of practice, including photography, experimental audio works. In 1991 he formed Granular  Synthesis with Kurt Hentschlager
